messages.message: Welcome to Villa! Excited to be here?
You can ask me anything, and I'll respond. For example, ask me how to fly in Villa.
Do you want to create GenAI Art? Or build worlds? Ask me how and I'll show you
Did you know you can create virtual worlds on Villa? Ask me how
Did you know you can travel virtually anywhere on Earth on Villa? Ask me how
You want to play? Ask me how to play on Villa on Galactica
